name: Nikon Capture NX-D Sidecar File
summary: An NKSC file is a metadata file created by Nikon Capture NX-D, a Nikon camera RAW image processing application used to edit .NEF and .NRW images. It contains a record of the edits made to a RAW image. Nikon Capture NX-D saves edits in NKSC files so you can retain the original, unedited copy of your RAW image.
